exceptions.exn: No such bound variable l2 (possible names are: a1, l and l1).

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Type
empty: A
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}

Goal:
forall (a : A) (l1 l2 : list bool) (l3 : pbtree), pbfree l1 l3 -> ~ is_prefix l2 l1 -> ~ is_prefix l1 l2 -> pbfree l1 (pbadd a l3 l2)

Premises:
Inductive pbtree : Type := pbleaf : A -> pbtree | pbleft : pbtree -> pbtree | pbright : pbtree -> pbtree | pbnode : pbtree -> pbtree -> pbtree
Inductive pbfree : list bool -> pbtree -> Prop := pbfree_left1 : forall (b : pbtree) (l : list bool), pbfree (true :: l) (pbleft b) | pbfree_left2 : forall (b : pbtree) (l : list bool), pbfree l b -> pbfree (false :: l) (pbleft b) | pbfree_right1 : forall (b : pbtree) (l : list bool), pbfree (false :: l) (pbright b) | pbfree_right2 : forall (b : pbtree) (l : list bool), pbfree l b -> pbfree (true :: l) (pbright b) | pbfree_node1 : forall (b c : pbtree) (l : list bool), pbfree l b -> pbfree (false :: l) (pbnode b c
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
pbadd = fix pbadd (a : A) (t : pbtree) (l : list bool) {struct l} : pbtree := match l with | [] => pbleaf a | true :: l1 => match t with | pbleaf _ => pbright (pbadd a (pbleaf empty) l1) | pbleft t1 => pbnode t1 (pbadd a (pbleaf empty) l1) | pbright t2 => pbright (pbadd a t2 l1) | pbnode t1 t2 => pbnode t1 (pbadd a t2 l1) end | false :: l1 => match t with | pbleaf _ => pbleft (pbadd a (pbleaf empty) l1) | pbleft t1 => pbleft (pbadd a t1 l1) |
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
Inductive is_prefix : list bool -> list bool -> Prop := prefixNull : forall l : list bool, is_prefix [] l | prefixCons : forall (b : bool) (l1 l2 : list bool), is_prefix l1 l2 -> is_prefix (b :: l1) (b :: l2) Arguments is_prefix (_ _)%list_scope Arguments prefixNull _%list_scope Arguments prefixCons _%bool_scope (_ _)%list_scope
pbfree_pbadd_prop1 : forall (a1 : A) (l l1 : list bool), ~ is_prefix l l1 -> ~ is_prefix l1 l -> pbfree l (pbadd a1 (pbleaf empty) l1)
permutation_trans : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 l3 : list A), permutation l1 l2 -> permutation l2 l3 -> permutation l1 l3
pbadd_prop2 : forall (a1 : A) (l1 : list bool) (l2 : pbtree), pbfree l1 l2 -> permutation (compute_pbcode (pbadd a1 l2 l1)) ((a1, l1) :: compute_pbcode l2)
permutation_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), P [] [] -> (forall (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l2 l1 -> P l2 l1 -> P (a :: l2) (a :: l1)) -> (forall (a b : A) (l : list A), P (a :: b :: l) (b :: a :: l)) -> (forall l1 l2 l3 : list A, permutation l1 l2 -> P l1 l2 -> permutation l2 l3 -> P l2 l3 -> P l1 l3) -> forall l l0 : list A, permutation l l0 -> P l l0
prefixCons : forall (b : bool) (l1 l2 : list bool), is_prefix l1 l2 -> is_prefix (b :: l1) (b :: l2)
number_of_occurrences_permutation : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (l1 l2 : list A) (a : A), permutation l1 l2 -> number_of_occurrences eqA_dec a l1 = number_of_occurrences eqA_dec a l2
permutation_app_comp : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 l3 l4 : list A), permutation l1 l2 -> permutation l3 l4 -> permutation (l1 ++ l3) (l2 ++ l4)
Inductive permutation (A : Type) : list A -> list A -> Prop := permutation_nil : permutation [] [] | permutation_skip : forall (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l2 l1 -> permutation (a :: l2) (a :: l1) | permutation_swap : forall (a b : A) (l : list A), permutation (a :: b :: l) (b :: a :: l) | permutation_trans : forall l1 l2 l3 : list A, permutation l1 l2 -> permutation l2 l3 -> permutation l1 l3 Arguments permutation [A]%type_scope (_ _)%list_scope Arguments permutation_nil _%type_scope Arguments permutation_skip _%type_scope _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments permutation_swap _%type_scope _ _ _%list_scope Arguments permutation_trans _%type_scope (_ _ _)%list_scope
is_prefix_ind : forall P : list bool -> list bool -> Prop, (forall l : list bool, P [] l) -> (forall (b : bool) (l1 l2 : list bool), is_prefix l1 l2 -> P l1 l2 -> P (b :: l1) (b :: l2)) -> forall l l0 : list bool, is_prefix l l0 -> P l l0
is_prefix_sind : forall P : list bool -> list bool -> SProp, (forall l : list bool, P [] l) -> (forall (b : bool) (l1 l2 : list bool), is_prefix l1 l2 -> P l1 l2 -> P (b :: l1) (b :: l2)) -> forall l l0 : list bool, is_prefix l l0 -> P l l0
find_code_app : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (a : A) (l1 : code A) (l2 : list (A * list bool)), not_null l1 -> find_code eqA_dec a (l1 ++ l2) = match find_code eqA_dec a l1 with | [] => find_code eqA_dec a l2 | b1 :: l3 => b1 :: l3 end
permutation_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall l1 l2 : list A, {permutation l1 l2} + {~ permutation l1 l2}
unique_key_perm : forall (A B : Type) (l1 l2 : list (A * B)), permutation l1 l2 -> unique_key l1 -> unique_key l2
all_permutations_permutation : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 : list A), In l1 (all_permutations l2) -> permutation l1 l2
permutation_all_permutations : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l1 l2 -> In l1 (all_permutations l2)
unique_key_app : forall (A B : Type) (l1 l2 : list (A * B)), unique_key l1 -> unique_key l2 -> (forall (a : A) (b c : B), In (a, b) l1 -> In (a, c) l2 -> False) -> unique_key (l1 ++ l2)
number_of_occurrences_app : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (l1 l2 : list A) (a : A), number_of_occurrences eqA_dec a (l1 ++ l2) = number_of_occurrences eqA_dec a l1 + number_of_occurrences eqA_dec a l2
permutation_skip : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l2 l1 -> permutation (a :: l2) (a :: l1)
encode_app : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (l1 l2 : list A) (c : code A), encode eqA_dec c (l1 ++ l2) = encode eqA_dec c l1 ++ encode eqA_dec c l2
unique_key_in_inv : forall (A B : Type) (a : A) (l1 l2 : B) (l : list (A * B)), unique_key l -> In (a, l1) l -> In (a, l2) l -> l1 = l2
permutation_map : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l1 l2 -> permutation (map f l1) (map f l2)
length_encode_nId : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (a : A) (l1 : list bool) (l : list (A * list bool)) (n : nat), length (encode eqA_dec ((a, l1) :: l) (id_list a n)) = n * length l1
Inductive cover (A : Type) : list (btree A) -> btree A -> Prop := cover_one : forall t : btree A, cover [t] t | cover_node : forall (l1 l2 : list (btree A)) (t1 t2 t3 : btree A), permutation l1 (t1 :: t2 :: l2) -> cover (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> cover l1 t3 Arguments cover [A]%type_scope _%list_scope Arguments cover_one _%type_scope Arguments cover_node _%type_scope (_ _)%list_scope
encode_cons_inv : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (a : A) (l1 : list bool) (l : list (A * list bool)) (m1 : list A), ~ In a m1 -> encode eqA_dec ((a, l1) :: l) m1 = encode eqA_dec l m1
number_of_occurrences_O : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (a : A) (l : list A), ~ In a l -> number_of_occurrences eqA_dec a l = 0

```coq
intros a l1 l2 l3 H1 H2 H3.
apply pbfree_pbadd_prop1 with (l1 := l1) (l2 := l2).
auto.
auto.
Qed.```
